meta.title: Nitu Pal - React Native Developer
meta.description: Experienced React Native developer with 3+ years in mobile app development. Specializing in cross-platform solutions and innovative mobile experiences.

home.intro: React Native Developer with <1>3+ years</1> of experience crafting exceptional mobile applications that delight users and drive business success.
home.expertiseDescription: Specialized in cutting-edge mobile technologies with a focus on performance, scalability, and user experience.
home.ctaDescription: Let's collaborate to create innovative mobile solutions that make a difference.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate mobile developer with a mission to create exceptional user experiences through innovative technology solutions.
about.storyContent1: With over 3+ years of experience in mobile app development, I've had the privilege of working on diverse projects that have shaped my expertise in React Native and cross-platform development.
about.storyContent2: My journey began with native mobile development, but I quickly discovered the power of React Native in creating efficient, scalable, and maintainable mobile applications. Since then, I've been dedicated to mastering this technology and helping teams deliver exceptional mobile experiences.
about.storyContent3: I believe in the importance of clean code, collaborative teamwork, and continuous learning. Every project is an opportunity to innovate and push the boundaries of what's possible in mobile development.
about.journeyDescription: A timeline of key milestones in my mobile development career.

journey.title: Intern at SoftNotch
journey.description: Began exploring mobile app development with native Android and iOS technologies.

journey.title: Junior Software Developer at SoftNotch
journey.description: Explanding my knowlege in react native and moving from native to react native

journey.title: Software Developer at SoftNotch
journey.description: Creating and delivering end to end solutions for mobile app developement along with delpoyment
